lead_paragraph: Any player who is late for a pro-am will be allowed to play, but may be asked to take part in additional sponsor activities.
snippet: Any player who is late for a pro-am will be allowed to play, but may be asked to take part in additional sponsor activities.

headline.main: Tour Rule That Cost Furyk Is Shelved
headline.seo: PGA Tour Suspends Rule That Barred Furyk for Missing Tee Time
headline.print_headline: Tour Rule That Cost Furyk Is Shelved
